Functions for plotting multiple channels/ raw data

Functions for plotting raw data

pyEDFieeg.rawPlotiEEG.plot_raw_eeg_plotly(raw_data, ch_names)

Plot of the raw data (channels x time points) for

Parameters

  • raw_data (array) – raw data, channels x time points

  • ch_names (list) – a list of the channels names

Returns

A plotly figure instance where channels are displayed using an offset in one single graph.
